dialogues.speaker: milo
dialogues.text: Principal Finley, I'll cut right to the chase... I've always wanted to say that, it makes me sound like a 1940s detective... Anyway, It's the school's chatroom.

dialogues.speaker: milo
dialogues.text: Some CRAZY stuff is going on in there. Like, not 'crazy' crazy, like 'man, that's crazy' but more like… 'man… that's crazy'. You know?

dialogues.speaker: milo
dialogues.text: Someone named ‘Hockey_291’ on your school's online chatroom seems to be violating your bullying policy and is threatening to post pictures of another student in their underwear.

dialogues.speaker: milo
dialogues.text: As I was on my way over here, I had a thought - could we call customer support from Chatroom Technologies to see if they can assist us in tracking this student bully down?

dialogues.speaker: milo
dialogues.text: Tell them to meet me and Luna in the Computer Lab! We'll get to the bottom of this - there’s just something we have to do first.
